content:
I've been a user/consumer of HL7 and FHIR on several projects, yet most of the projects were to obtain a level of understanding in order to get the project completed ASAP.

Now, I'm trying to broaden my understanding.

I've been working my way though the Specs and put together a list of of DEVDays Youtube Videos to watch and learn from.
(Great deal of technical information out there on youtube).

The one thing I've not been able to find is the bigger picture perspective on how it all ties together.
From the definition of an Implementation Guide (FSH and other tools) to how the IG is used by delivery teams to deliver workable solution(s).
How is the IG used by teams?
How/What tools are delivery teams using to transform the IG into solutions(s), validations, constrains and so on....

Does anyone know of a good set of docs/Video(s) that can provide a broader picture or multiples ?

Thank you in advance ..
I think you are giving us a very good idea to do some webinar on "Ok, so I have an IG. What now?"

You may also be interested in the upstream process - how do you actually prepare some awareness/engagement for companies to develop based on FHIR, and how can we encourage people to use those IGs as an actual reference , instead of inventing their own IG.

@Jose Costa Teixeira Thank you I will take a look.

If you are needing someone who has limited exposure to review and ask "stupid" questions with limited context, I'm your guy.
